metadata.title: Configuration Between digital power supply ground and analog power supply ground

sections.content:
Question:
Is the digital power supply ground VSS of the microcomputer and the analog power supply ground AVSS0 and AVSS1 of the built-in A/D converter and D/A converter isolated?
Answer:
It is connected through a diode inside the microcontroller.
Suitable Products
RX Family
